title: Storm of Prophecy - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Drama   Ancient Times   Multiple Protagonists   Royalty   Tribal Society   Wars
author: Jin HeZai   今何在
description: The story follows the brotherhood of a imprisoned half-human half-spirit prince, an abandoned son of a general, and the heir of a slaughtered tribe as they uncover the secrets of their past and seek both revenge and justice for the ones they love.>
